Based on the information provided, here is a suggested website structure and summary for Bloom.pm:

1. Home Page:
- Welcome message and introduction to Bloom.pm
- Clear call-to-action (CTA) to partner with Bloom.pm
- Highlight the target audience (corporates, development agencies, entrepreneurs, etc.)
- Showcase the key benefits of the platform and services offered

2. What We Do / Services:
- Provide an overview of Bloom.pm's products and services
- Emphasize the learning-by-doing platform and its adaptability
- Explain how the platform supports adaptive programs, both online and offline, with human facilitation
- Include sections on assessments, goal setting, action planning, implementation, and continuous learning
- Highlight the quantified adaptive learning approach and its benefits

3. Platform:
- Provide detailed information about the Bloom.pm platform
- Explain the features, functionalities, and tools available
- Showcase the software-supported human-guided learning and growth approach
- Include visuals and screenshots to demonstrate the platform's interface and user experience

4. Our Programs & Impact:
- Provide an overview of the programs offered by Bloom.pm
- Highlight the impact and success stories of previous programs
- Include a notification/highlight button for programs currently accepting applications
- Showcase testimonials and feedback from program participants

5. Join Us:
- Provide information on how to join Bloom.pm
- Include a link to the sign-in page or app (when ready)
- Highlight career opportunities and encourage visitors to join the Bloom.pm team

6. News:
- Share the latest news and updates from Bloom.pm
- Include blog posts and newsletter signup for more engagement
- Feature upcoming workshops and events

7. About Us:
- Provide a summary of Bloom.pm's mission, vision, and values
- Share the story behind the organization and explain why it was established
- Include an introductory video showcasing Bloom.pm's work and approach
- Link to an updated video at www.bloom.pm/updates (for release notes)

8. Partners:
- Highlight credibility and visibility by showcasing partner organizations
- Include a CTA for new partners to reach out
- Emphasize the benefits of partnering with Bloom.pm
- Provide a link to a dedicated page for program partners

9. Methods & Tools:
- Explain how Bloom.pm supports learning and development for teams and companies
- Showcase the use of AI for adaptive human-centric learning
- Mention the WISE Systems proposal and its relevance
- Include information about Bloom.pm's teams and their roles

10. Past Programs:
- Provide information about previous programs conducted by Bloom.pm
- Showcase the success stories and impact of these programs
- Share relevant reports or case studies in PDF format through signup

11. Footer:
- Include a non-profit accelerator programs section
- Highlight Bloom.pm's involvement with NGOs and civil society
- Provide information about entrepreneurship and universal skills programs
- Include a section for trainers and mentors, encouraging visitors to join the Bloom Community
- Include a CTA for program partners to run a program with Bloom.pm
- Provide a donation option to support Bloom.pm's initiatives

By organizing your website in this manner, you can effectively showcase your services, attract your target audience, and provide a clear and engaging user experience. Remember to include visually appealing elements, compelling CTAs, and relevant content to drive conversions and user engagement.
